  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/531</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/531</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'aigua és H2O?</string>
            <string language="en">Is water H2O?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist Wasser H2O?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau est-elle H2O ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É a água H2O?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È l'acqua H2O?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι το ύδωρ H2O;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva amb 4 apartats sobre aigües potables, els estats físics de l'aigua, l'aigua com a dissolvent i la composició de les aigües envasades. Conté un glossari, exercicis d'autoavaluació (Avalua't) i una proposta de pràctica (Practica) per a destil·lar aigua.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) in four sections on drinking water, physical states of water, water as a solvent, and the composition of bottled water. It includes a glossary, self-assessment exercises, and an experiment to distil water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aigua potable</string>
            <string language="en">drinking water</string>
            <string language="es">agua potable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aigua</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
            <string language="es">agua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">contaminació de l'aigua</string>
            <string language="en">water pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) in 
vier Kapiteln auf Trinkwasser, in den körperlichen Zuständen des 
Wassers, im Wasser als Lösungsmittel und im Aufbau des abgefüllten 
Wassers. Es schließt ein Glossar ein, trainiert Selbstbewertung
und ein Experiment, um Wasser zu destillieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) dans quatre 
sections sur l'eau potable, états physiques de l'eau, eau comme 
dissolvant, et la composition de l'eau mis en bouteille. Elle 
inclut un glossaire, art de l'auto-portrait-assessment s'exerce, et une expérience 
pour distiller l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em quatro 
seções na água bebendo, em estados físicos da água, em água como
um solvente, e na composição da água bottled. Inclui um 
glossário, o self-assessment exercita, e uma experiência para 
destilar a água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) in quattro
sezioni su acqua potabile, fisico medica dichiara di acqua, di 
acqua come solvente e della composizione di acqua in bottiglia. 
Include un glossario, la valutazione di se stesso si esercita e 
un esperimento per distillare l'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) σε τέσσερα 
τμήματα πόσιμου νερού, φυσικές καταστάσεις του ύδατος, του 
ύδατος ως διαλύτη, και της σύστασης του εμφιαλωμένου ύδατος. 
Περιλαμβάνει ένα γλωσσάρι, τις ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης, 
και ένα πείραμα για να αποστάξει το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trinkwasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserverunreinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">eau potable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pollution de l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água bebendo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poluição da água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua potabile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inquinamento dell'acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πόσιμο νερό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρύπανση των υδάτων</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
